page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE(CONTINUED)
page.content: went to town we went all over wondering what to get.Dad left us so he could do the food shopping.Mum bought some plants and David bought a record.We had some lunch at Macdonalds and then I went to Miss Selfridge to get some jewellery.Then we caught the bus home.When we got home the phone was ringing so we quickly opened the door and I answered it.It was one of David's friends seeing if he could play.David did and played until 7.00pm because we had dinner at 7.30pm.We had fish and chips.While we were having dinner,my uncle and cousin came.I hurried to finish my dinner so I could play with my cousin.They went home at 8.30pm so they could be home for Dynasty.We watched it too and when it had finished we played Monopoly, and Mum won.At 11.50pm I washed,cleaned my teeth,read a book and went to bed.
